description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Divinatory Cards of the Silver Skulls Chapter. Librarians with Divination Powers may double the effect of a successful Invocation Test, and gain +1 to effective Psy Rating when using the Augury Psychic Power. If used by a Space Marine without Psy Rating, allows them to cast Augury as if possessing Psy Rating 1, although requiring a -10 Ciphers (Chapter Runes) Test.

Requirements

Silver Skulls Chapter Only.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 25 R
